inclusion.criterion: Patient is 18 years of age or older
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient has an ICD (Implantable Cardiac Defibrillator) or will be implanted with one
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: prior to discharge of ablation procedure
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Patient has had at least 2 documented spontaneous episode of sustained ischemic VT (Ventricular Tachycardia) within the previous 6 months
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: quote: "40 seconds of VT and then bradycardia with a rate of 39 shortly thereafter corresponding with his symptoms"

inclusion.criterion: Patient is resistant, intolerant or refractory to at least one Class I or III AAD (Anti-Arrhythmic Drug)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patient has been informed of the nature of the study and has agreed to its provisions and provided written informed consent approved by the Institutional Review Board
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: quote: "40 seconds of VT and then bradycardia with a rate of 39 shortly thereafter corresponding with his symptoms"

exclusion.criterion: History of stroke or transient ischemic attack within 6 months prior to enrollment
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: MI or previous cardiac surgery within 2 months prior to enrollment
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patient has chronic NYHA (New York Heart Association) class IV heart failure
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Limited life expectancy of 6 months or less
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patient is currently participating in another investigational drug or device study
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patient is unable or unwilling to cooperate with the study procedures
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 65 yo man with history of CAD and prior MI, HLD, HTN, ventricular tachycardia, and syncope was admitted earlier today evaluation of syncope and ventricular arrhythmias.
